adrFormatAddress: 5047 Broadway, New York, NY 10034, USA

originalText.text:
We have a physically dangerous man living in the building (tore his apartment to shreds, pummels his metal front door to the point of breaking it (see image), screams all night, throws dangerous objects into hallways, and much more). He's a threat. M&N management, including their legal staff, have long been aware of this present danger to residents, and aren't providing safety measures promised to their rent paying residents. 14+ residents persistently complain and they essentially ignoring us all or play dumb. Threats (including but not limited to): Physical violence towards residents; Setting the building ablase; Tossed debris falling on building passerby; and more.

These do not even include personal injuries already sustained by residents, including Stress, Anxiety, Depression, Sleep Deprivation, PTSD, Emotional Harm, to name a few.

See damaged door below. This is a solid metal door.

originalText.text:
Absolutely reprehensible management company. At best incompetent and at worst outright criminal. What is for certain is that they have nothing but absolute contempt for the tenants of the buildings they manage.

I have been a tenant in one of those buildings for 5+ years. For the last 2 years a dangerous, mentally ill man has been causing extreme disruptions to the lives of other tenants. He has made threats against the building and other tenants, he has been in the common areas of the building naked, has been forcibly removed from the building multiple times by police, has stalked tenants, destroyed property in his apartment, screamed racist slurs at tenants, pounds on his walls and door with a hammer at all hours of the day and night (from 2am to around 7am just today) and management has done NOTHING to ensure the safety of tenants that are forced to reside in the same building as him.

They repeatedly, shamelessly lie to tenants about the actions they are taking and could not care less about the horrendous living situation that we find ourselves in. Do not do business with these people, do not rent in a building they manage, do not trust anyone that works there, and generally stay far away from them.

originalText.text:
This management company absolutely refuses to accept responsibility or accountability for their numerous mistakes and misinformation.

M & N Management really dropped the ball. I have been a diligent tenant in one of their buildings since 2014, almost ten years now. I have been calling the management office intermittently since July of 2022 to inquire about the availability of three bedroom apartments within the same building. Was told each time that I've been added to their "waitlist" and would be called when an apartment opened up. This was not the case. I was never called and found out too late that a three bedroom apartment on the same floor of my building, just across the hall from my apartment was listed on Street Easy on on 4/4/23,  was up for four days then delisted on 4/7/23, rented out to new tenants. When I called the management office back to inquire about this the gentleman I spoke with seemed to be surprised by this information. Nor were they aware I was on any waitlist to be called for an opening for a three bedroom apartment, nor could they come up with a response as to why I was not called.

Needless to say I am very disappointed and very disheartened with this incident because I absolutely love my building and neighborhood and would love to remain here. It is also very concerning to know that they do not have an efficient way to track these interactions system wide.

**UPDATE**

I called the management office on 7/20/23 to inquire about apartment availability and to confirm I was still on their waitlist only to be told there was no waitlist and that I would have to call at the end of each month for availability. I then called on 9/1/23 to check for apartment availability to then be told that there is a new protocol that was put in place two months ago that required people interested in apartments to complete a registration form. At no point was I informed of this when I called on 7/20/23, less than two months ago.

I have ongoing emails with members of the management office team consistently asking why these issues and miscommunications keep arising. No one will directly answer my questions and I have been continuously disregarded. Absolutely no one has acknowledged that they have dropped the ball on this entire situation.

Additional update: still no response to my inquiries as to why the ball was dropped and why so much misinformation was provided to me, but was pretty much told to look elsewhere. Have the email chain to back it up.

originalText.text: Would give zero stars if I could. I have had to deal with a lunatic living above me who bangs on the floors and walls of his apartment for almost 2 years causing my partner and I to lose sleep and all quality of life. Management hasn’t done anything to remove him from the building. Regularly lies about their efforts to assist us in this matter. Everytime you call them you get a different person everytime who seems to be unaware of any ongoing situations or conversations you’ve had with them. Do not rent from them, they do not care about you or your problems.
